director.name: 约翰·席恩菲尔德 John Scheinfeld

this_title: Sergio Mendes in the Key of Joy
trans_title: 塞尔吉奥·门德斯的喜悦旋律
introduction: A joyful, cinematic celebration of this singular musical artist, who remains as vital and relevant today as when he exploded on the scene with his group, Brasil '66. With a rich, multi-layered approach to storytelling, the film digs deep to reveal the forces that shaped his incredible journey.—John Scheinfeld
chinese_title: 塞尔吉奥·门德斯的喜悦旋律
foreign_title: Sergio Mendes in the Key of Joy
